sources.title: Penny Dreadful | Full Movie | Horror Mystery Thriller | @MovieCentral
sources.description:
After Penny Dearborn witnessed the deaths of her parents in a tragic accident in the snowy mountains outside of Los Angeles at the young age of 8, she developed an acute fear of cars that still traumatizes her. Determined to overcome her fear, Penny, now 19, has been undergoing therapy with a therapist, Orianna, who specializes in helping people conquer their worst fears.

2006 | Stars: Rachel Miner, Mimi Rogers, Lucy Rogers-Ciaffa
*Licensed from Voltage Pictures. All rights reserved*

metadata.Plot: Young Penny goes on a retreat with her psychologist; the intention is to help her overcome her phobia, an intense fear of cars. Unexpected events find her in a nightmarish situation where her worst fears come true.
metadata.Writer: Diane Doniol-Valcroze, Arthur K. Flam, Richard Brandes
metadata.Actors: Rachel Miner, Mimi Rogers, Lucy Rogers-Ciaffa
